steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We start by understanding your vision, goals, and challenges. Through collaborative workshops, we define requirements and create a strategic roadmap.

steps.title: Design & Prototyping
steps.description: Our designers create wireframes and interactive prototypes, ensuring the user experience is intuitive and aligned with your brand.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Our engineers bring designs to life using agile methodologies. You'll see progress in bi-weekly sprints with continuous feedback loops.

steps.title: Testing & QA
steps.description: Rigorous testing ensures your product is bug-free, performant, and meets all requirements before launch.

steps.title: Deployment
steps.description: We handle the entire deployment process, from infrastructure setup to go-live, ensuring a smooth launch.

steps.title: Support & Optimization
steps.description: Post-launch, we provide ongoing support, monitoring, and optimization to ensure continued success.
